name: The Adventures Of Madhu The elephant
name_original: The Adventures Of Madhu The elephant
description:
The Adventures Of Madhu The elephant is a 2d, adventuric story based game. One day madhu's kid is kidnapped by a lion what goona mafhu do? 

Help him if you have the guts

Come, play, enjoy

 i think that this will give you a better experience

This is my own first game

Controls:

Left-Left key 

Right-Right key 

Jump-up key
